name: contour data
desc: The contour_data module provides a means to color surface and volumetric objects in solid colored bands.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.

properties.name: Contour By
properties.desc: The Contour By control selects the type of data to use in contouring

properties.name: Prepend Contoured String
properties.desc: The Prepend Contoured String toggle when selected will add the "Countoured" string to the output data component.  This allows the user to indicate the data has been altered across the band the by the module.

properties.name: Contour Component
properties.desc: The Contour Component refers to the nodal data component that will be used to create the contours.

properties.name: Cell Contour Component
properties.desc: The Contour Component refers to the cell data component that will be used to create the contours.

properties.name: Band Data
properties.desc: Band Data assigns the color of the each contour using one of three options. Min of Band chooses the color (according to your Datamap) which would be determined by the minimum value of each band. Avg of Band chooses the color (according to your Datamap) which would be determined by the average value of each band. Max of Band chooses the color (according to your Datamap) which would be determined by the maximum value of each band.

properties.name: Contour Distribution
properties.desc: The Contour Distribution allows the user to choose between automatically generating contour levels or setting them by hand.

properties.name: Logarithmic Decades
properties.desc: When the data has been log processed the Logarithmic Decades determines the number of contours.  If the Log option is selected the Contours Per Log Decade value is used. If Unformatted is selected the Number Of Contours is used.

properties.name: Contours Per Log Decade
properties.desc: If the Log Option is Selected for Logarithmic Decades the increments per decade can be set with this value.

properties.name: Number Of Contours
properties.desc: When the data is log processed the Number Of Contours refers to the number of contours per decade.  If the data is linear processed the number of contours refers to the total number of contours to be drawn.

properties.name: Minimum Contour Level
properties.desc: The Minimum contour level displays the minimum value of the Contour Component.

properties.name: User Contour Levels
properties.desc: The Contour Levels are user defined levels.

properties.name: Maximum Contour Level
properties.desc: The Maximum contour level displays the maximum value of the Contour Component.
